about_the_game:
Play as Zeke, a Son of Seldarine as you explore the realm of Riftania and recruit multiple party members with different classes, as you progress onward traveling through different rifts that traverse different realms and timelines in order to defeat the 3 Demon Generals and the Dark Lord, saving the Realms from the imminent demonic threat, and optionally go on further to stop Seldarine, God of the Elves!

- Grow herbs using the Farming skill and use them to make tons of potions!

- Mine ores using the Mining skill, smelt them into bars and craft them into useful weapons and armor!

- Delve into multiple optional dungeons for better spells, skills, unique elemental weapons and armors!

- Complete Main and Side quests in order to fully explore every nook and cranny of the realms!

- Use fires around the world to cook basic foods into yummy stat boosting pies and health restoring rations!

- Unlock extra content after the main story is completed!



The Demo for Rift Walker! This Demo includes pretty much the entirety of Cradalios and should give you an idea of the mechanics and gameplay that is to come for the rest of the game! Defeat the Tower of Arms 4 and Unlock the Cradalios Dungeon!

short_description: A demo for a medieval turn-based action game with time traveling elements! Travel with your party across the realms and slay many demons, creatures, and other enemies trying to stop you from defeating the Dark Lord!
